gameIntro.title: How to Play
gameIntro.subtitle: The Balance Game - Assertiveness Training
gameIntro.objectiveTeam: Team Objective: Earn the highest Project Score compared to other teams
gameIntro.objectiveIndividual: Individual Objective: Balance your 3 KPIs without burning out
gameIntro.cardAssertiveCost: Cost: -1 from any KPI you choose
gameIntro.cardAssertiveNote: Note: If the card has a custom cost, you must choose which KPI this cost applies to.
gameIntro.teamScoreInitial: At the start of the game, the initial team score equals the number of players × 10.
gameIntro.teamScoreDescription: Team score is calculated based on assertive reactions:
gameIntro.teamScoreAllAssertive: All Assertive: Special bonus (as per card)
gameIntro.teamScoreOnlyOneAssertive: Only One Assertive: Special bonus (as per card)
gameIntro.teamScorePerPersonAssertive: Per Person Assertive: Score × count (as per card)
gameIntro.feedbackDescription: For assertive reactions, the active player (who read the card) gives feedback:
gameIntro.feedbackRelationship: • Relationship Health: Good (+1), Normal (no change), Bad (-1)
gameIntro.feedbackGoal: • Goal Achievement: Could (+1), Normal (no change), Couldn't (-1)
gameIntro.burnoutDescription: If any of a player's 3 indicators reaches zero, they experience burnout. The team loses -10 points and the player's indicator returns to 3 (shock). Also, they are deprived of playing assertively for one round (the next round).
gameIntro.roundSituationDetail: A challenging work scenario is revealed
gameIntro.roundDecisionDetail: Players select their reaction cards and place them face down. Then all cards are revealed simultaneously.
gameIntro.roundDecisionThinking: If anyone played non-passive: 1 minute thinking time
gameIntro.roundDecisionReaction: Non-passive reactions: Maximum 3 minutes per player
gameIntro.roundDecisionFeedback: For assertive reaction: Active player gives feedback
gameIntro.roundDecisionCustomCost: If card has custom cost: Player chooses which KPI the cost applies to
gameIntro.roundResolutionDetail: Individual and team scores are calculated and results are displayed
gameIntro.strategyDescription: Learn to balance your individual needs (maintaining KPIs) and team needs (earning Project Score). Assertiveness is powerful but costly - choose wisely!

game.readCardAloud: Read the text on this card aloud for others
game.clickCardHint: Click on the card to display the card text.
game.cardRevealedInstruction: After you read the game card, the other players must choose one of the reaction cards and place it face down in the middle of the table, and then all cards will be revealed simultaneously.
game.thinkingTitle: Okay, now one minute of thinking
game.thinkingDescription: {{names}} were not passive, and now they must express their reaction to the topic within a maximum of 3 minutes. Before reacting, there is one minute to think and prepare their speech.
game.secretDescription: From now on, no one except {{name}} should see the screen :/
game.reactionDescription: {{name}} must perform a {{reaction}} reaction towards {{activePlayer}} within a maximum of 3 minutes.
game.resultsDescription: Now you can show the screen to others too
game.reactionFeedbackRelationshipQuestion: How was the effect of {{name}}'s reaction on the health of her relationship with you?
game.reactionFeedbackGoalQuestion: Do you think {{name}}, with this reaction, was able to convince you to think about her request?
game.playerProfileDescription: Here we can see {{name}}'s profile and scores
game.historyDescription: A report of what you have done during the game.
game.customCostQuestion: Which of your parameters should this cost be applied to?
game.fatigueWarning: This player is fatigued and cannot play assertively
game.fatigueCannotPlayAssertive: This player is fatigued and cannot play assertively
game.burnoutAlertDescription: {{playerName}} experienced burnout! Due to a team member's burnout, {{penalty}} points were deducted from the team score. {{playerName}} also received a shock to return to the game with 3 points in {{kpiName}}.
game.burnoutHistoryDescription: Times this player has experienced burnout
game.noBurnoutHistory: This player has not experienced burnout yet
game.feedbackImpactAlert: Feedback from {{activePlayer}} to {{playerName}}'s reaction has affected {{kpi}}
game.burnoutRecoveryDescription: Shock applied and {{kpiName}} score returned to 3
